org.drip.analytics.output

Class BondWorkoutMeasures

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.output.BondWorkoutMeasures

  • public class BondWorkoutMeasures
extends java.lang.Object
    BondWorkoutMeasures encapsulates the parsimonius yet complete set of measures generated out of a full bond analytics run to a given work-out. It contains the following: - Credit Risky/Credit Riskless Clean/Dirty Coupon Measures - Credit Risky/Credit Riskless Par/Principal PV - Loss Measures such as expected Recovery, Loss on instantaneous default, and default exposure with/without recovery - Unit Coupon measures such as Accrued 01, first coupon/index rate
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
